questions.question: Test again
questions.answer:
1. Visit the Zesthealth Kids Baby Book Sign Up page 
  2. Click on 'Register as New User'
  3. Select your country of origin
  4. Enter your first and last name
  5. Enter your mobile number and email address
  6. Create a password and confirm it
  7. Agree to the terms of use and privacy policy
  8. Click on 'Register'

9. Verify your account via email and mobile number for added security.

questions.question: To log in to your account
questions.answer:
1. Go to Zesthealth Kids babybook Login page
  2. Enter your email and password
  3. Click 'Login'

3. Enter the verification code sent to your email address

4. Verify your account and log in.

questions.question: Creating a baby book
questions.answer:
1. Click on 'Create a Baby Book'
  2. Enter your baby's nickname
  3. Choose a display picture
  4. Enter your baby's birthdate
  5. Click 'Save'

questions.question: Filling in general information
questions.answer:
1. Select the baby book you want to fill in
  2. Click on the 'General Information' tab

3. Enter your baby's general information, insurance details, emergency contacts, and general contacts.

4. Double check the information before saving

5. Click 'Save' at the bottom to store the information.

questions.question: Can I create multiple baby book?
questions.answer:
Certainly! You have the option to create multiple baby books simultaneously, as long as you ensure that each baby is unique and not duplicated. To create a baby book, follow these steps:

  1. Navigate to the overview section and locate the 'Create Baby Book' button.
  2. Click on the button to initiate the creation process.
  3. Provide all the necessary details and information required to save the baby book.


By following these instructions, you can create multiple baby books while ensuring that each one is distinct and personalized.

questions.question: Using Milestones
questions.answer:
Milestones allow you to track your child's developmental achievements. They are divided into different categories such as social and emotional, language and communication, cognitive, and physical development. To create your baby's first milestone:

1. Click on the 'Create Milestone Album' button to create an album.

2. Choose between 'Standard' or 'Unique Milestone' You can create both standard and unique milestones.

3. For a Standard Milestone:

  • Select an album name
  • Select the milestone age
  • Select the milestone
  • Upload a photo (optional)
  • Add a caption (optional)
  • Click the 'Create' button to save

4. Create an album name

  • Upload a photo (optional)
  • Add a caption (optional)
  • Click the 'Create' button to save

questions.question: I can’t upload a specific milestone in the standard milestone
questions.answer: In the milestone section, you can see the button for “Create Milestone Album” click the button then choose “Unique Milestone” from here you can upload customize milestones for your baby.

questions.question: My child did not achieve a certain milestone, is there something wrong with my child?
questions.answer: Developmental milestones serve as markers for a child's growth and development. However, it is important to remember that every child develops at their own pace in different areas. If you have concerns about your child's development due to unmet milestones, it is recommended to consult a healthcare professional who can provide a comprehensive evaluation. Parenting can be challenging, and it is natural to experience anxiety about various aspects of your child's well-being. Seeking guidance from a pediatrician can offer reassurance and support.

questions.question: Uploading Files in Health Documents
questions.answer:
You can upload files in the Health Documents section of the app to keep track of your child's medical records. To upload a file:

1. Select a baby book

2. Click on the 'Health Documents' tab

3. Click 'Add new record'

4. Create a folder name and upload a file

5. Click the 'Create' button

questions.question: How can I convert an image to a word file?
questions.answer: Go to “Health Documents” and then click “add new record” choose “Pdf to Word” option and then upload your file. Once your file is transported as text click the button “Create” and add your folder name.

questions.question: How can I convert a pdf file to a word file?
questions.answer:
Go to “Health Documents” and then click “add new record” choose “Image to Word” option and then upload your file. Once your file is transported as text click the button “Create” and add your folder name.Once your file is transported as text click the button “Create” and add your folder nam

How can I convert a pdf file to a word file?

questions.question: Notification on Scheduled Check-ups
questions.answer:
You can choose the version of check-ups you want to display and use. You will be notified when your baby's scheduled check-up is done, due, or overdue. This helps you keep track of your child's check-ups.

Version template

Custom check-ups

questions.question: Deletion of Custom Check-ups
questions.answer: To delete a custom check-up in your baby book, locate the specific entry in the files column, click on the three dots next to it, select 'Delete Check-up' from the dropdown menu, confirm the deletion, and the custom check-up will be removed from your baby book.

questions.question: Change your Scheduled Check-up schedule version
questions.answer: To access the versions of scheduled check-ups per country in the scheduled check-ups section, click on the gear icon. Once you click on the gear icon, a list of available versions will appear, allowing you to choose the specific version you want to use for the scheduled check-ups

questions.question: Immunizations
questions.answer:
Immunizations follow the immunization schedule on different versions of baby book. This helps you identify and track the vaccinations your child has already had and the ones they are supposed to have in the near future. Each vaccine has an indicated due date, calculated based on your child's date of birth.


Version template Immunizations

questions.question: I can't find a vaccination schedule fit for my child, what should I do?
questions.answer:
You can always customize your vaccine schedule according to your doctor, you can scroll down go to custom check-up, click add new record and create your own vaccination schedule


You can also send a suggestion or recommendation by contacting us. Remember to put your Subject as Immunization Schedule Request. In the contents of your message put a reference for the immunization schedule requested and other details such as country of origin, year released and source.

questions.question: Change your Vaccine Version According to your Preferred Country
questions.answer: To access the versions of immunization per country in the immunization section, locate and click on the gear icon. Once you click on the gear icon, a list of available versions will be displayed, giving you the option to choose the specific version you want to use for the immunization records.

questions.question: How can I see the growth percentile of my child?
questions.answer: To view the summary of your child's growth percentile on the growth chart section, locate the 'Show Percentile' option and check the box beside it. By doing so, the growth chart will display the percentile information, providing you with a summary of your child's growth in relation to other children of the same age.

questions.question: Sharing of baby book for two (2) or more accounts
questions.answer: Yes, it is possible to share your baby book with two or more accounts simultaneously. To do so, ensure that you set the desired time for sharing with the intended accounts. This will allow multiple individuals to access and view the baby book simultaneously.

questions.question: Can I control sharing of baby books to the shared accounts?
questions.answer: To revoke access to your baby book for shared accounts, follow these steps: locate the 'Share Baby Book' button, click on 'Manage Sharing,' find the status arrow, expand the options, and select 'stop sharing.' By following these steps, you can easily manage and control the sharing of your baby book with other accounts.

questions.question: How can I share the baby book with non-users of Zestheath Kids?
questions.answer: You have the option to share your baby book with non-users of Zesthealth Kids, but please note that you can only provide them with view access. They will not be able to edit the baby book. By sharing the baby book, they will be able to view its contents and information.

questions.question: How can I determine which accounts have access to my baby book?
questions.answer: To view the accounts with access to your baby book, click the 'Share' button, select 'Manage Sharing,' and you will see a list of the accounts that can access your baby book.

questions.question: Safety and Security
questions.answer: To ensure the security of your account, you are required to verify both your email address and your mobile number upon signing in. The app allows you to fully secure the privacy of your account via a verification code each time you log in.

questions.question: Rules and Policies
questions.answer: It is important to follow the app's rules and policies to ensure a safe and secure experience for all users.

questions.question: How should I access my account if I forgot my password?
questions.answer:
To regain access to your account if you forget your password, follow these steps:

1. Go to the login page and locate the 'Forgot Password' option.

2. Click on the 'Forgot Password' link to initiate the password recovery process.

3. An authentication code will be sent to the mobile number or email address associated with your account.

4. Enter the authentication code in the provided field.

5. Once the code is verified, you will be prompted to create a new password.

6. Enter your desired new password and confirm it.

7. Save the changes, and your password will be updated.

By following these steps, you can successfully regain access to your account if you forget your password.

questions.question: What is Zesthealth News
questions.answer: Zesthealth News is where you can find useful articles and news that can help both you and your baby. It keeps you informed and updated about the latest happenings in the world of parenting and child development.

questions.question: How can I search a specific document without going through each folders?
questions.answer: At the top of each category, there is a search bar, you can type there the file you want to see and enter to open the file.

questions.question: How can I become familiar with navigating the baby book interface?
questions.answer: To access the user manual for navigating the baby book, click on your profile name and select 'User Manual' from the dropdown menu. The user manual will provide guidance and instructions on how to navigate the baby book effectively.

questions.question: Is there a way for me to choose a timeout for my account for security purposes?
questions.answer: To enhance the security of your account, you can enable automatic logouts after a specified period of inactivity. To do this, access your account's settings, navigate to the 'Security settings' option, and choose the desired number of hours of inactivity before automatic logout. This feature ensures that your account is logged out automatically when left inactive, adding an extra layer of security.

questions.question: How can I subscribe to the Newsletter?
questions.answer:
To subscribe to a newsletter and receive regular updates:

1. Access your account settings by clicking on 'User settings.'

2. Locate the 'Newsletter' section in the settings menu.

3. If you are currently unsubscribed, click on the subscribe button to start receiving the newsletter.
